description: Deed of Variation to Section 106 Agreement dated 14 October 2016 and as amended by a First Deed of Variation dated 31 December 2018 in relation to planning permission 15/12936/FUL (Demolition of existing outbuildings, alterations and part demolition of main two storey building. Use of existing building and site as secondary school and erection of three storey rear extension to provide 6537sqm of additional floorspace for classrooms, etc, and sports hall accommodation for six forms of entry for seven year groups. Provision of Multi-Use Games Area to rear and enclosures to front and rear to provide outside space associated with the school. Provision of widened pedestrian/cycle access route between Wolsey Drive and Richmond Road and alterations to the front car park to provide a total of 82 parking spaces and provision of cycle parking,  etc)  as amended by 17/12805/NMA, 17/12982/FUL, 20/01710/FUL,  22/00025/NMA  and 22/00026/FUL. Variation to detailed wording of agreement to regularise the position and reflect the  amendment applications and the works approved under planning permission 22/00026/FUL dated 21 September 2022, which  reduced parking numbers and removed drop-off arrangements.
